title: An Act to regulate hemp-derived beverages like alcohol

abstracts.abstract: Senate, November 10, 2025 -- The committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure to whom was referred the petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 222) of William J. Driscoll, Jr. for legislation to regulate Hemp-derived beverages by imposing a fine if a person that is involved in establishing or maintaining an infused beverage manufacturing operation without an endorsement granted by the commission, report the accompanying bill (Senate, No. 2663).

actions.description: Reported from the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: committee on Senate Ways and Means
the committee on Senate Ways and Means
